name: New York City Coverage
description:
Made for the 2023 GEOPIPE NYC game jam, New York City Coverage is a high-flying short story game where you whisk above the streets of Midtown Manhattan; completing tasks, flying customers around the city and sharing some good humor with your manager Bud. 

This game was made in a little less than one month and I tried to base a lot of it's environment off of the real life locations of the city. Whether it be the Rockefeller Center, St. Patrick's Cathedral or 6th Avenue; iconic sights of the Big Apple are not hard to find in NYC Coverage. 

Please enjoy! Also a big thanks to all the creators of assets used in this game, and for those who have played or will be playing this game! Credits for assets are below.

CONTROLS:

-WASD, Direction Buttons (Full Controls Explained in game)

SIDE NOTE:

-This game has no save or load features so I recommend that you play in one sitting(roughly 20 minutes)(or maybe 10 if you are a skilled pilot!)

-A version of the game without Bloom and other Post-Processing effects will be available in downloads for those who prefer no Post Processing.

CREDITS:

Game asset Sources and Credits

-Thanks to these asset creators! Without them, this game could have not been made in under a month.
